'''Karin Severinson''' is a former Mojang employee that handled financial accounting.<ref>{{tweet|KarinSeverinson|383089986289278977|@ElectroBoy2560 I handle the finances|September 25, 2013}}</ref> She was hired in January 2012.{{citation needed}}

In her personal life, Karin is married<ref>{{tweet|KarinSeverinson|365697416839700482|Today I have been married 5 years to my love @nolll yay!|August 8, 2013}}</ref> and has children.<ref>{{tweet|KarinSeverinson|273775062803431425|@Chappers57 yes Henrik and our kids (2 and 4 years old) are all ok! They were very happy when i got home :D|November 28, 2012}}</ref>
